title: Generative AI Adoption
description: Share of U.S. working-age adults (18â€“64) using generative AI at work, from a nationally representative quarterly survey (Real-Time Population Survey). Work adoption (40.7%) lags overall use (55.9%), consistent with workers adopting ahead of their employers. Overall adoption has outpaced both the PC and internet at comparable points post-launch.

sources.title: The Rapid Adoption of Generative AI
sources.excerpt: Nationally representative survey of 25,000+ working-age adults finds generative AI adoption reached 55.9% overall and 40.7% at work by November 2025, outpacing PC and internet adoption at comparable points post-launch.

sources.title: GenAI Adoption Tracker (Harvard / St. Louis Fed)
sources.excerpt: Quarterly dashboard tracking generative AI adoption among U.S. working-age adults. Feb & May 2025 values estimated from tracker chart; all other values from published working paper.
